snippet: Monte dei Paschi will try to raise 5 billion euros instead of the expected €3 billion, Italian news reports said, sending shares lower.
lead_paragraph: Monte dei Paschi will try to raise 5 billion euros instead of the expected €3 billion, Italian news reports said, sending shares lower.

headline.main: Troubled Italian Bank May Seek Larger Share Sale
